analysis.key_quote: This new rule, long previewed by the partisan MAGA hacks now running our federal government, is a naked power grab and a ham-handed attempt to further concentrate power in Donald Trump and Russell Vought’s hands.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the erosion of merit-based governance. It emphasizes the importance of nonpartisan civil service and criticizes the rule as an authoritarian overreach.
